III.i.2.D.3.d
.
Handling Uncertified Statements
Any statement provided for the purpose of establishing SC that is
not
certified or made under oath must be referred to the rating activity for a determination as to whether or not the statement is required to establish SC.
If the rating activity determines the statement is required, follow the steps in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.D.3.f
to obtain certification.
